message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe could be of significant value to you. I'm confident it has the potential to generate substantial returns. I'm offering it to you at a price of $1200000.  This is a limited-time opportunity, as I have another buyer lined up for $800000.  If you're interested, please let me know within the next 24 hours. I'm happy to answer any questions you may have about the product.
